Meal Match.about: A Tinder-like web app utilizing Firebase Authentication, Firebase Database, and 3 Google Maps APIs providing real-time connections with peers to find a restaurant in the area.

Search Engine.about: A web crawler and search engine running off of a client-side Express API for scoring and displaying results from a local database given a query.

SQL Importer.about: A lightweight Python program for converting any json, csv, or xml file into an SQLite database.

BrainAnd.about: A unique esoteric programming language for an intense puzzle game built with Unity.

Settlers of Catan.about: A faithful reaction of the popular board game Settlers of Catan using Java Swing.

Core Control.about: An arcade-style 2D game with Unity for the Zeno Game Jam, placing 2nd among 78 submissions.

Bloxorz.about: A reimagining of the flash game Bloxorz in 2D utilizing Pygame. Distributed to 90 students through PyInstaller, earning recognition as the top project among the advanced groups.
